hero.name: Yuli
hero.title: Frontend & Mobile Developer | DevRel
hero.description: I build exceptional and accessible digital experiences for the web and mobile apps.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I am a Frontend Developer with over 3 years of experience building responsive and scalable web and mobile applications using React.js, React Native and TypeScript. I specialize in turning Figma designs into pixel-perfect, accessible user interfaces, integrating RESTful APIs, and optimizing performance across devices and browsers. With a strong foundation in Agile methodologies, I enjoy collaborating in diverse teams to build data-driven, inclusive digital experiences that are both functional and beautiful.
